DOC.brief_title: Hemodynamic Changes After Aortic Aneurysm Treatment With Stent-Graft
DOC.detailed_description: This study assess hemodynamic change aortas patient treatment abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) FDA approve stent-graft ( Zenith ) . This study require change clinical protocol way AAA procedures currently do . Utilizing catheter already employed procedure , intravascular blood pressure measurement document various time various anatomic level prior deployment stent-graft . As compliant aortic aneurysm act capacitor , expand systole contracting diastole , hypothesis endovascular AAA repair use non-compliant stent-graft change aortic pulse profile .
